nodes.bodyText: @NonNullByDefault({}) - cool trick. removing @nonnull without adding explizit @nullable. nice. i was not aware of that one.
You should really use constants instead of literals when accessing storage.
good point. change it also in HomekitAuthInfoImpl to constants.
Making the configuration final doesn't solve this warning?

good point. i have not paid attention to this until now.
so, made all nullable and nonNull annotation inline.
you are right.. to much clean up. better to keep stack trace. reverted back the change
